bibl.title: Oriental Institute Hawara Papyri. Demotic and Greek Texts from an Egyptian Family Archive in the Fayum (Fourth to Third Century B.C.).
bibl.publisher: The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago
bibl.note: P. Chic. Hawara 1-9. James G. KEENAN assumed the task of editing the Greek dockets and the Greek document P. Chic. Hawara 7C (Receipt for 2% tax on conditional transfer of one-third of a house, July 21, 245 B.C.). - Pp. 63-70. Edition of the Rendell Papyrus on the basis of the photographs published in: Diana RENDELL and Kenneth RENDELL, The Ancient World 3100 B.C. - 800 A.D.: Early Writing from Mesopotamia and Egypt (Newton, 1979) p. 98. Donation of a house, various shares of other real estate, and sources of income, with a Greek docket dated to September 5, 232 B.C.
bibl.seg: HUGHES George R. † and Richard JASNOW (edited by), with a contribution by James G. KEENAN, Oriental Institute Hawara Papyri. Demotic and Greek Texts from an Egyptian Family Archive in the Fayum (Fourth to Third Century B.C.). (Oriental Institute Publications. 113.)
Chicago, The Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago, 1997, 4°, xxviii-100 pp., 4 figg. et 62 pll. ISBN 1-885923-02-3. $45.

P. Chic. Hawara 1-9. James G. KEENAN assumed the task of editing the Greek dockets and the Greek document P. Chic. Hawara 7C (Receipt for 2% tax on conditional transfer of one-third of a house, July 21, 245 B.C.). - Pp. 63-70. Edition of the Rendell Papyrus on the basis of the photographs published in: Diana RENDELL and Kenneth RENDELL, The Ancient World 3100 B.C. - 800 A.D.: Early Writing from Mesopotamia and Egypt (Newton, 1979) p. 98. Donation of a house, various shares of other real estate, and sources of income, with a Greek docket dated to September 5, 232 B.C.
